title: Visa Black Card sans-serif
content:
I am trying to figure out what typeface Visa Black Card uses. Some typefaces like Gotham and Johnston come to mind but they don't fit. I wouldn't be surprised if it was custom but have no reason to assume it is.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [card\_front.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317232547/http:/typophile.com/files/card_front.png) | 77.41 KB |
| [BC\_logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317232547/http:/typophile.com/files/BC_logo.png) | 3.88 KB |
author: tylor.reimer

comments.content: I suppose they don't use a free font, but **[Florencesans (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317232547/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Florencesans%20-%20Bold&fid=dd011796b9f991c097ad3ad9285fa500&fsize=60&text=BLACK%20CARD&fit=1)** by Apostrophic Labs looks very close if not an exact match
